price: ឱម៉ារយ៉ាំ. ចូរអ្នកគោរពទៅចំពោះម្ចាស់់របស់អ្នក ហើយ ចូរអ្នកស៊ូជូត និងរូកុជាមួយនឹងអ្នករូកុ(ថ្វាយបង្គំរួមគ្នា)។
arabic: يَٰمَرۡيَمُ ٱقۡنُتِي لِرَبِّكِ وَٱسۡجُدِي وَٱرۡكَعِي مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: yāmaryamu uq'nutī lirabbiki wa-us'judī wa-ir'kaʿī maʿa al-rākiʿīna
